Yudh (Hindi: Ã Â¤Â¯Ã Â¥ï¿½Ã Â¤Â¦Ã Â¥ï¿½Ã Â¤Â§) is an Indian television psychological thriller miniseries directed by Ribhu Dasgupta, starring veteran actor Amitabh Bachchan in the lead role.It also stars other veteran actors such as Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Sarika and Kay Kay Menon.This show is Amitabh Bachchan's debut fiction television show .Produced by Endemol India and Saraswati Creations, Yudh premiered on Sony Entertainment Television India on 14 July 2014.

Plot
Yudhisthir Sikarwar, is an elite businessman who owns a construction company known as Shanti Constructions. He wishes to venture into the mining industry but he is diagnosed with a neuropsychological disorder, which has no treatment, and he can live up the maximum of just two years more. He is now caught in a battle with himself and his health, an emotional battle with his family and a corporate battle with his rivals.
